result.arabic_text: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا
result.translation: Iyo ndishi ihambaye, igizwe n’ivyubahiro vyo hejuru bazohabwa mu Bwami bw’ijuru, hakurikijwe urugero rw’icubahiro c’umwe wese mu baja ku rugamba, hiyongeyeko ukugumirizwa akabanga ku vyaha vyabo ntibabihanirwe, hamwe rero no kugirirwa impuhwe n’Imana Allah. Burya Imana Allah Yamye ari Nyenimbabazi-ntangere ku wigaya, Nyenimbabazi ku batoni bayo baja ku rugamba.
